page.title: 10ATHERSLEY AREA SHOPPING.
page.content: In our area we have two big supermarkets they are the{COOP}and the{ASDA}. Most of the other shops are small and tend to be expensive. The ASDA is the largest supermarket in our area. It stands at the junction of Laithes Lane and Laithes Crescent. Every day about 2000 people come to the ASDA.100 people are employed there but only 10 live within our survey area. (Some work in the morning and others in the afternoon.) The store has 14 tills, 10 downstairs and 4 upstairs. It sells 12000 different items. Here are just a few: sugar, sweets, car seats,groceries and covers. The most popular item on sale in all 101 ASDA stores is sugar.(96,000,000)bags of sugar are sold every year in all ASDA Stores.
